basics.name: Gabriel Chavez
basics.label: DevOps Apprentice at Three Knots
basics.summary: DevOps, Cloud Services, Management experience, Doctorate of Pharmacy

work.name: Three Knots
work.summary: Worked with Docker, VirtualBox, and AWS.  Collaborated on a project to deploy a containerized website solution for mosques, with optional features and easy setup and customization

references.name: Michael Jerome
references.reference: Pharmacy Operations Manager - Worked with at Walgreens - Michael was a subordinate, but was responsible for overseeing the technicians and worked with me daily.

references.name: Dr. Kristine Quon
references.reference: Staff Pharmacist - Worked with at Walgreens - Kristine was a subordinate, but was the other half of the coin to keeping the pharmacy running smoothly.  Where I put stuff down, she picked it up and vice versa.

references.name: Taifur Asif
references.reference: Main mentor in DevOps, and owner of Three Knots consulting firm.  Met with him virtually for over in an async manner, to get new project ideas and help working though problems

references.name: Saad Momandi
references.reference: DevOps Mentor, worked with him at Three Knots.  Had weekly meetings for a while to help me work through problems
